# Replicated Instance Types (Beta)

When creating a VM-based cluster with the compatibility matrix, you must specify a Replicated instance type.


<table>
  <tr>
        <th width="30%">Type</th>
        <th width="35%">Memory (GiB)</th>
        <th width="35%">VCPU Count</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>r1.small</th>
    <td>8 GB</td>
    <td>2 VCPUs</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>r1.medium</th>
    <td>16 GB</td>
    <td>4 VCPUs</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>r1.large</th>
    <td>32 GB</td>
    <td>8 VCPUs</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>r1.xlarge</th>
    <td>64 GB</td>
    <td>16 VCPUs</td>
  </tr>      
  <tr>
    <th>r1.2xlarge</th>
    <td>128 GB</td>
    <td>32 VCPUs</td>
  </tr>  
</table>
